titleStmt.title: Pidax Petreia, or, The disc[ov]erie of S. Peters well, [a]t Peter-head, in Scotland being in latitude 57.d.43.m. and in longitude 22.d.40.m. : shewing the admirable vertues thereof, against many deplorable diseases / by A.M. student in medicine.
titleStmt.author: Mure, Andrew.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs of Andrew Hart,

notesStmt.note: First two words of title in Greek lettering.
Running title: The well of Peter-head.
Imperfect: t.p. torn with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
